original_text: The entrance room, the windows and the pictures of palm trees were the same as those in the east gate. Seven steps went up to the north gate. The entrance room into the yard was at the end of the passage.
korean_text: 그 창과 현관의 길이와 너비와 종려나무가 다 동쪽을 향한 문간과 같으며 그 문간으로 올라가는 일곱 층계가 있고 그 안에 현관이 있으며

sentences.original_text: The entrance room, the windows and the pictures of palm trees
were the same as those in the east gate.
Seven steps went up to the north gate.
The entrance room into the yard
was at the end of the passage.
